data.title: Great yoga community
data.text: Very chill studio in St George of all places.   I attended twice on a recent trip and was welcomed with open arms.  Mats are available for use and the hot classes are great.  The only drawback is no showers are available.  You will need them.  I will return.  Thanks.

data.title: love it!
data.text: The hot yoga is amazing. Regardless of your yoga experience this is something you should do. I couldn't believe how much energy I had after the class.

data.title: Great location!
data.text: Great studio and instructors! The BE 60 is a great class. The heat may initially be intimidating but it is amazing how much deeper and smoother your body moves when the room is hot. Everyone must try!

data.title: nice, small studio
data.text: be hot offers a few different ways to stay fit, from "hot" yoga to kettle bells and something they call "barefoot boot camp," i don't know what that is but it sounds like healthy fun! i prefer the hot yoga class myself, based on the bikram method but with variations of the poses, not including some, etc etc. the teachers are excellent, the room is nice. the only drawback is the lack of showers.
